rows.name: Project Name
rows.explanation: A unique alphanumeric identifier for each project.

rows.name: Project Coordinator
rows.explanation: The first and last name of the primary contact for the project.

rows.name: Study Area Name
rows.explanation: A description for each unique research or monitoring area including its location, habitat type(s), land use(s) and habitat disturbances (where applicable)"

rows.name: Study Area Description
rows.explanation: The first and last name of the primary contact for the project.
rows.example: This study area was located in the south-east corner of the Birch Mountains Wildland Provincial Park in the Boreal Highlands subregion. The area consisted primarily of bogs, patches of pine, aspen and birch forest as well as riparian meadow habitats. There was no land use disturbance in the study area

rows.name: Survey Name
rows.explanation: Describe the specific objectives of each survey within a project

rows.name: Survey Design
rows.explanation: The spatial arrangement of remote cameras within the study area for an individual survey.
